sentences.sContent: He struts around town like he owns the place.
sentences.sCn: 他在城里趾高气扬地走着，好像他拥有着这地方似的。

synos.tran: 炫耀；在…上趾高气扬地走；给…加支撑

trans.tranOther: to walk proudly with your head high and your chest pushed forwards, showing that you think you are important
a long thin piece of metal or wood used to support a part of a building, the wing of an aircraft etc
